# Simple GTK Desktop Environment (SGDE) is a project that aims to a simple and minimal desktop environment, with apps without or with minimal special libs, this project uses GTK3 C

![C](https://img.shields.io/badge/-044f99?style=flat-square&logo=c&logoColor=fff)
![GTK3](https://img.shields.io/badge/GTK3-527999?style=flat-square&logo=gtk&logoColor=fff)
![Geany](https://img.shields.io/badge/Geany-ff6222.svg?style=flat-square&&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
